name: Kite Dreams
description:
If I follow the kite, where will it take me?

A game created for the CGX Grad Jam 2021, where the theme we were given was "I must be dreaming"

Credits: 

Adam Bilyea - 3D Art & Animation

Safa Nazir - UI and 3D Art

Jessica Le - Tech Art and Animation

Rowan Luckhurst - Character Art & Animation

Lillian Fan - Programming

Eashvar Balachandran - Programming

Ricky Caceres - Game Audio & Design
